title: Student Profile
description:
Create a student profile with the following variables:
- String studentName = "Alice"
- int studentAge = 20
- double gpa = 3.85
- boolean isEnrolled = true

Then print: Alice is 20 years old

Hint: println(studentName + " is " + studentAge + " years old");
